greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (n / GreatestPrimeFactor(n)) * SmallestPrimeFactor(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) <= n; a(n) = n iff n is a prime power: a(A000961(n)) = A000961(n);
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{ps = First /@ FactorInteger[n]}, n * First[ps] / Last[ps]]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 27 2020 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 1, my(f=factor(n)[,1]~); n*vecmin(f)/vecmax(f)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 27 2020
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 05 2007
